name: Fear of the Knight
description:
A game about a Knight armed with a bow in a first-person zombie survival situation.  Defeat waves of zombies and try to survive as long as you can.

You can not Chop the darker trees that surround the level's border and there is no escape from the zombies.

If you stand still long enough,  they will find you...

How to Play 1.  Press Arrow Keys to Move and Turn 2.  Press Space facing Tree to chop Wood. 3.  Press C to Craft Arrows from Wood. 4.  Press Space when not facing Tree to shoot an Arrow. 5.  Slay Wild Boar to gain 5 Health. 6.  Slay all Zombies to complete Wave.

Created for Scream Jam 2021
